1370: Gheldekin was born in Doelen in 1370.
Got married to Linnea at age 29 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Linnea, Woltwigis, at age 29.
1371: Had a son with Linnea, Abelkijn, at age 30.
1372: Had a son with Linnea, Iacobus, at age 31.
1374: Had a son with Linnea, Ghisele, at age 33.
1376: Had a daughter with Linnea, Zuanelt, at age 35.
1377: Had a daughter with Linnea, Salome, at age 36.
1378: Had a daughter with Linnea, Waldrada, at age 37.
1379: Had a daughter with Linnea, Reymodis, at age 38.
1382: Lost daughter Reymodis when Reymodis was 4 years old.
